newsletter_tagline: Curated protein signals by Recep Adiyaman
preheader_text: Top design signals, quick reads, and pipeline tips from Recep Adiyaman.

dataset_pool.title: Protein Data Bank (PDB)
dataset_pool.summary: The single global archive for macromolecular structure data.

dataset_pool.title: CATH / Gene3D
dataset_pool.summary: Hierarchical classification of protein domain structures.

dataset_pool.title: UniProt
dataset_pool.summary: The world's most comprehensive resource for protein sequence and annotation.

dataset_pool.title: BINDER
dataset_pool.summary: A curated database for protein-protein binding affinity and structures.

dataset_pool.title: ProteomeXchange
dataset_pool.summary: Centralized archive for proteomics data submission and discovery.

tool_pool.title: PyMOL
tool_pool.summary: Gold standard for molecular visualization and publication-quality imaging.

tool_pool.title: Chai-1
tool_pool.summary: Multi-modal foundation model for molecular structure prediction.

tool_pool.title: ProteinSolver
tool_pool.summary: Graph-based neural network for protein sequence design.

tool_pool.title: RFdiffusion
tool_pool.summary: State-of-the-art generative model for de novo protein design.

tool_pool.title: ProteinMPNN
tool_pool.summary: High-speed sequence design optimized for fixed-backbone folding.

tool_pool.title: OpenFold
tool_pool.summary: Fast, trainable, and open implementation of AlphaFold2.

tool_pool.title: ChimeraX
tool_pool.summary: Next-gen molecular visualization for large data sets.

pipeline_tips: Pin reference genomes by checksum to avoid version drift.
Use local MSA generation (colabfold_search) to bypass speed bottlenecks.
Always validate pLDDT scores before using AlphaFold models for docking.
Normalise thermal B-factors when comparing different crystal structures.
Use GPU-accelerated MD refinement to lift model quality in under 2 hours.
Verify FASTA headers for special characters that break Rosetta pipelines.
Index your BigWig files before visualization to save memory.
Use Snakemake for reproducible end-to-end protein design workflows.
Check for missing residues in PDB files using PDB-Fixer before simulation.
Employ HADDOCK for ambiguous restraints in protein-protein docking.

quotes.text: The protein structure is the language of life; design is its poetry.
Deep learning is not a magic wand, but a powerful lens for structural biology.
